title: Review: Parlee RZ7 aero road bike cheats all the winds, goes fast everywhere
content:
Introduced at Sea Otter 2019, the Parlee RZ7 garnered mixed opinions for its looks, but one thing was for sure, it left nothing to chance when it came to cheating the wind. This road bike took the best aero features of their TTiR triathlon bike, which is arguably the first production bike with disc brake covers. And […]

The post Review: Parlee RZ7 aero road bike cheats all the winds, goes fast everywhere appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
